Sparks and Martin Chilvers (2019). `hagis', an R Package Resource for Pathotype Analysis of Phytophthora sojae Populations Causing Stem and Root Rot of Soybean. Molecular Plant-Microbe Interactions 32.12 (Nov 2019) p. 1574-1576. DOI: 10.1094/MPMI-07-19-0180-A
